document.full_text: georgia's governor on friday signed a tough new state law cracking down on illegal immigrants that is similar to one enacted in arizona last year, handing new powers to police in the southern state.
document.title: georgia governor signs immigration crackdown
lines_and_colors: georgia's governor on friday signed a tough new state law cracking down on illegal immigrants that is similar to one enacted in arizona last year, handing new powers to police in the southern state.
